name: Macra
summary: Huge crustacoids who feed on noxious gases that are deadly to humans.

name: Magic Man
summary: Martian; after magic seem to have been transferred to Betty, Simon's fianc√©e, he turned Magic Man into "Normal Man".

name: Mangalores
summary: Thick-skinned humanoids; warriors and weapon specialists. Considered savage and brutish by other races.

name: Mantrins
summary: Kangaroo-like aliens with large, powerful back legs; native to Solbrecht. The character Stith is a Mantrin. Also called Sogowans.

name: Marklars
summary: Orange-skinned aliens with egg-shaped heads and yellow eyes. They refer to all people, places, and things as "Marklar".

name: Marro
summary: Skinless creatures with insectoid social organization

name: Martians
source: H. G. Wells' The War of the Worlds
summary: Tentacled and very intelligent and technologically advanced. Attempted to take over Earth as Mars became less and less habitable for them.

name: Martians
source: Marvin the Martian from Looney Tunes and Duck Dodgers

name: Martians
source: Mars Attacks (Topps trading cards) and Mars Attacks! (Tim Burton movie)
summary: Skeletal humanoids with massive craniums and a twisted sense of humour

name: Masari
summary: A sentient race of ancient Atlantians that are human-like in appearance.

name: Mechanon
summary: sentient mechanical race created by the Eorna

name: Meekrob
summary: Pure energy beings. Meekrob was set to be conquered by Invader Tenn until she received a shipment of malfunctioning SIR Units giving away her location and thus angering the Meekrob, creating further tension between the Meekrob and the Irken Empire.

name: Memory Donk
summary: The Memory Donks are a species of "old-lady"-like beings that take away the memory of anyone around them.

name: Merewifs
summary: Merewifs are a race of mermaid-like creatures. Most notably, Plum

name: Metroid
summary: A creature that, in its infancy, resembles a jellyfish-like creature capable of siphoning the life force of other creatures, using this to kill them. As it grows, it undergoes two metamorphoses, the first one making it similar to an arthropod, and the second one making it resemble a quadrupedal theropod dinosaur. They were created by the Chozo to be used as weapons against the more dangerous X parasite.

name: Mewmans
source: Star vs. the Forces of Evil

name: Micros
summary: Microbial aliens that inhabit the brain and offer their host new abilities.

name: Minbari
summary: Crested humanoids; a small number have telepathic abilities

name: Miu Miu-miu
source: My Lover from the Planet Meow

name: Mogadorians
summary: Humanoid, warlike race intent on destroying the Loric and invade Earth. Described as having very pale skin and dark hair and eyes.

name: Moon Dragons
summary: Moon Dragon toenails are used to make the Bravest Warriors' space suits.

name: Moonflowers
summary: Childlike creatures with Mood plumes resembling flowers, they live on moons that don't orbit planets.

name: Mooninites
source: Aqua Teen Hunger Force (individually: Igninokt and Err)

name: Morlocks
source: H. G. Wells' The Time Machine

name: Mor-Taxans
source: War of the Worlds (TV series - first season)

name: Morthren
source: War of the Worlds (TV series - second season)

name: Movellans
summary: Humanoid robotic conquerors; fought a war with the Daleks

name: Mri
source: C. J. Cherryh's Faded Sun trilogy
